entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom controls existing in XAML at launch time are not updated via HotReload (.NET MAUI) #8948
  • Fix (or don't) the behavior of calling "Focus" on Android to open the picker #8946
    6.0-servicing
  • Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #8945
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Apply TimePicker and DatePicker focus changes to Picker control #8944
    6.0-servicing
  • Collection View Header and Empty View not showing on Android when ItemSource is null #8934
  • Button IsEnabled does not restore visual state #8932
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat public for .NET 7 #8931
    .NET 7
  • App crashes only in release and only on physical device #8928
  • Pull to refresh on RefreshView does not hide the refresh indicator. #8926
  • Label inside a HorizontalStackLayout inside a Border does not work with TailTruncation #8925
  • ScrollView inside border is not working in Mac and iOS #8923
    6.0-servicing
  • CollectionView seems to reuse images when loading more on Android. #8920
  • CollectionView lagging on start scrolling for Android #8919

Closed

  • PlatformBehavior can't be attached to a view Behaviors list #8907
  • [iOS]Wrong cursor position in Editor on ios and maccatalyst #7691
  • SecureStorage #8921
  • MT1008: Failed to launch the simulator: Value cannot be null. #8833
  • What is the difference between debug and release on iOS? #8927
  • How to profile MAUI on iOS? #8875
  • Invoking PropertyChanged() on .NET Maui does not notify Binding View on Android. Works on Windows and iOS. #8900
  • CollectionView not scrolling inside a StackLayout or without setting HeightRequest #8888
  • Catalyst app under Mac idiom crashes on start when using slider control #8715
    6.0-servicing
  • Maui DesignTools.dll is missing Embedded Image resources #8726
    6.0-sr4
  • Auto Update MAUI App #8800
  • Ship my Xamarin.UITest to work with MAUI framework #7368
  • Style OnIdiom not working for Tablet & Desktop #8641

PullRequests

Created

  • [VisualDiagnostics] Allow RegisterSourceInfo to update existing targets #8947
    partner/ui-tools, do-not-merge
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • Non shell aot #8941
  • Shell tab aot #8939
  • Add Admin check for removing needs-info labels #8933
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat internal until .NET 7 #8930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [SingleProject] Fix SplashScreen behavior on Tizen #8917
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Make Date/Time Pickers on Android only pop up when tapped/clicked/enter key hit #8913
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • `IChangeToken` Nullability Fix #8937
  • Update the .NET 6 Version of MAUI #8924
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Update to Preview 7 #8884
  • Update WindowsAppSDK #8914

Updated

  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr3
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7
  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! (net7.0 / main) #8739
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
